title: Packing lists and shipping manifests
dataVerified: Shipper, consignee, detailed cargo list, quantities, weights, dimensions
dataVisibleAfterVerification: Manifest status (submitted/cleared). Link to shipper system (consignee and customs, requires authentication)
rationale: Prevents altered cargo lists (smuggling, customs fraud). Domain binding verifies shipper. Customs verification. Cargo security (C-TPAT, AEO compliance).
